1. Puppy found abandoned gets new Warrington home for Christmas  BBC
  2. Heartwarming transformation of bald puppy with one of the "worst" cases of mange  RSPCA

item.title: Dar es Salaam water crisis: Festive mood in Tanzanian city dampened by persistent shortages - BBC
item.description:
1. Dar es Salaam water crisis: Festive mood in Tanzanian city dampened by persistent shortages  BBC
  2. How Dar es Salaam’s poor are bearing the brunt of a water crisis  Down To Earth
  3. Revealed: Two contrasting sides of water crisis in Dar  MSN
